replies.body: For the time being, the pbe signup page is down for maintenance. I do see that you were able to apply back in January, and we were able to get that application. We're still working on getting some of the kinks ironed out with pbe, and you can keep up to date on the [**pbe status page**.](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)
